page.title: 06Plant Hire Firm
page.content: Harold Johns gives employment to about seven people and is a dealer in farm machinery. He repairs tractors and other agricultural implements. He also sells spare parts such as tractor tyres. Harold Johns buys a lot of the machinery at farm sales in other parts of the country, especially Cambridgeshire and the Midlands. Although he sells mainly to local farmers, he has also exported tractors to Ireland and Europe. He owns a small farm opposite the school on which he keeps some cattle. He also has two duck ponds in which he keeps ducks and trout. He allows the Curre Hunt to go hunting on his land as there are many foxes that live in the woods nearby.
